name: Wizard's Harmony
overview: Wizard's Harmony tells the story of the Wizard Rufus that after causing a scandal at the wizards academy and destroy the magical power of Dale, he is punished and begins the game having to recruit in his first week at the academy other 5 apprentices and after that they will have to train during a 3 years time to improve their stats at the wizards academy. The player can choose what their characters do each week, they can study, train different magic styles, be a better listener, rest, etc. Depending of the training the affinity of the members will be worse or better. In the weekends Rufus can go around different places of the academy or the town and maybe he can meet and talk to different people. Depending of their skills the students will go up a grade, the grades are: Grade 1 = 1st, grade 2 = 2nd, 3 = 3rd grade Some of the game characters are: Rufus, Chester, Maxx, Sonia, Melissa & Arisia.
